title: React.js
description: A powerful JavaScript library for building dynamic and responsive user interfaces using a component-based architecture.

title: JavaScript
description: The essential scripting language for web development, enabling interactive and functional web pages with real-time behavior.

title: HTML5
description: The backbone of the web, used for structuring content in a semantic and accessible manner.

title: CSS3
description: The styling language that brings design to life with layouts, animations, and responsiveness.

title: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern and custom UIs with minimal code.

title: Node.js
description: A fast, event-driven JavaScript runtime for building scalable server-side and network applications.

title: Express.js
description: A minimalist Node.js web framework that simplifies the creation of APIs and backend services.

title: MongoDB
description: A flexible NoSQL database that stores data in JSON-like documents, ideal for modern applications.

title: Git
description: A version control system that helps track changes and collaborate on code effectively.

title: Firebase
description: A complete backend solution offering authentication, real-time database, and hosting for web apps.
